meanings.definition: Inflammation of a valve, especially a heart valve.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with valvulitis after hearing a heart murmur.
meanings.sent2: Valvulitis can lead to serious heart problems if left untreated.
meanings.sent3: The heart valve threw a party, but only valvulitis showed up!
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like it was hosting a wild valvulitis party, with inflammation causing chaos.
meanings.sent5: The image of tiny firefighters trying to calm the inflamed heart valve stuck with him as a vivid example of valvulitis.
